successes.title: Radian 2: Time Lapse, Motion, and Wireless Camera Control
successes.description: Radian is a precision motion timelapse device that is wirelessly programmed from your smartphone.

Pledges.description:
Keep In Touch!
Stay up to date as this project becomes a reality.

Supporter!
Show your Radian 2 pride with one of our T- Shirts.
For owners of the original Radian who want to use their unit for linear time lapse. Does not include a slider. We will ask you which slider you want the adaptor kit for when the campaign closes.

Early Bird Radian 2 - 
Be one of the first to use the new Radian 2 to create beautiful panning time lapses. Add $30 for an L-bracket to create beautiful tilting time lapses.

Single Radian 2 - 
Be one of the first to use the new Radian 2 to create beautiful panning time lapses. Add $30 for an L-bracket to add tilting to your toolbox.

Radian 2 Slide - 
Get a Radian 2 and a linear adaptor kit - We will ask you which slider you want the adaptor kit for when the campaign closes.
Add $30 for an L-bracket to add tilting to your toolbox.

Radian 2 Slide - 
Get a Radian 2 and a linear adaptor kit - We will ask you which slider you want the adaptor kit for when the campaign closes.
Add $30 for an L-bracket to add tilting to your toolbox.

Pan + Tilt (2 Axes) -
Get two Radian 2s and two L-brackets so you can Pan and Tilt at the same time, or use them separately.

Slide + Pan (2 Axes) -
Get two Radian 2s and a linear adaptor kit. Combine linear and rotary motion to take seamless 2-axis time-lapses. We will ask you which slider you want the adaptor kit for when the campaign closes.
